item.title: Hello World
item.description: Hello and thanks for stopping by. I’m Denis, a software developer, passionate about theoretical computer science, web technologies and natural language processing. const id = x => x; In this blog I write down my thoughts and experiences on technology and science. I hope you find it interesting.
